trans-unit.source: Too many results to show. Refine your search.
trans-unit.target: Too many results to show. Refine your search.

trans-unit.source: To dismiss these notifications, restart the server.
trans-unit.target: To dismiss these notifications, restart the server.

trans-unit.source: To protect the site with password / have login enable this.
trans-unit.target: To protect the site with password / have login enable this.

trans-unit.source: Install manually mysql node module to use mysql (npm install mysql)
trans-unit.target: Install manually mysql node module to use mysql (npm install mysql)

trans-unit.source: The map module will use this url to fetch the map tiles.
trans-unit.target: The map module will use this url to fetch the map tiles.

trans-unit.source: MapBox needs an access token to work, create one at
trans-unit.target: MapBox needs an access token to work, create one at

trans-unit.source: It is highly recommended to use hardware accelerated (sharp or gm) lib for thumbnail generation
trans-unit.target: It is highly recommended to use hardware accelerated (sharp or gm) lib for thumbnail generation

trans-unit.source: Make sure that sharp node module is installed (npm install sharp).
trans-unit.target: Make sure that sharp node module is installed (npm install sharp).

trans-unit.source: Make sure that gm node module and
trans-unit.target: Make sure that gm node module and

trans-unit.source: Thumbnails will be saved in this folder. Write access is required
trans-unit.target: Thumbnails will be saved in this folder. Write access is required

trans-unit.source: High quality may be slow. Especially with Jimp.
trans-unit.target: High quality may be slow. Especially with Jimp.

trans-unit.source: The best matching size will be generated. (More size gives better quality, but use storage to store and CPU to render.)
trans-unit.target: The best matching size will be generated. (More size gives better quality, but use storage to store and CPU to render.)

trans-unit.source: ';' separated integers. If size is 200, that thumbnail will have 200^2 pixels.
trans-unit.target: ';' separated integers. If size is 200, that thumbnail will have 200^2 pixels.

trans-unit.source: Video support uses ffmpeg. ffmpeg and ffprobe binaries need to be available in the PATH or the @ffmpeg-installer/ffmpeg and @ffprobe-installer/ffprobe optional node packages need to be installed.
trans-unit.target: Video support uses ffmpeg. ffmpeg and ffprobe binaries need to be available in the PATH or the @ffmpeg-installer/ffmpeg and @ffprobe-installer/ffprobe optional node packages need to be installed.

trans-unit.source: Reads and show *.gpx files on the map
trans-unit.target: Reads and show *.gpx files on the map

trans-unit.source: Show hints while typing search query
trans-unit.target: Show hints while typing search query

trans-unit.source: Enables showing search results, while typing search query
trans-unit.target: Enables showing search results, while typing search query

trans-unit.source: Search is not supported with these settings
trans-unit.target: Search is not supported with these settings

trans-unit.source: Sharing is not supported with these settings
trans-unit.target: Sharing is not supported with these settings

trans-unit.source: This feature enables you to generate 'random photo' urls. That URL returns a photo random selected from your gallery. You can use the url with 3rd party like random changing desktop background.
trans-unit.target: This feature enables you to generate 'random photo' urls. That URL returns a photo random selected from your gallery. You can use the url with 3rd party like random changing desktop background.

trans-unit.source: Random Photo is not supported with these settings
trans-unit.target: Random Photo is not supported with these settings

trans-unit.source: Server will accept connections from this IPv6 or IPv4 address.
trans-unit.target: Server will accept connections from this IPv6 or IPv4 address.

trans-unit.source: Port number. Port 80 is usually what you need.
trans-unit.target: Port number. Port 80 is usually what you need.

trans-unit.source: Images are loaded from this folder (read permission required)
trans-unit.target: Images are loaded from this folder (read permission required)

trans-unit.source: If you access the page form local network its good to know the public url for creating sharing link
trans-unit.target: If you access the page form local network its good to know the public url for creating sharing link

trans-unit.source: If you access the gallery under a sub url (like: http://mydomain.com/myGallery), set it here. If not working you might miss the '/' from the beginning of the url.
trans-unit.target: If you access the gallery under a sub url (like: http://mydomain.com/myGallery), set it here. If not working you might miss the '/' from the beginning of the url.

trans-unit.source: The public url and the url base are not matching. Some of the functionality might not work.
trans-unit.target: The public url and the url base are not matching. Some of the functionality might not work.

trans-unit.source: Runs directory scanning and thumbnail generation (only for Jimp) in a different thread
trans-unit.target: Runs directory scanning and thumbnail generation (only for Jimp) in a different thread

trans-unit.source: Number of threads that are used to generate thumbnails. If auto, number of CPU cores -1 threads will be used.
trans-unit.target: Number of threads that are used to generate thumbnails. If auto, number of CPU cores -1 threads will be used.

trans-unit.source: Those thumbnails get higher priority that are visible on the screen
trans-unit.target: Those thumbnails get higher priority that are visible on the screen

trans-unit.source: Shows only the required amount of photos at once. Renders more if page bottom is reached
trans-unit.target: Shows only the required amount of photos at once. Renders more if page bottom is reached

trans-unit.source: Caches directory contents and search results for better performance
trans-unit.target: Caches directory contents and search results for better performance

trans-unit.source: Show the caption (IPTC 120) tags from the EXIF data instead of the filenames.
trans-unit.target: Show the caption (IPTC 120) tags from the EXIF data instead of the filenames.

trans-unit.source: Show the number of items (photos) in the folder
trans-unit.target: Show the number of items (photos) in the folder

trans-unit.source: If there was no indexing in this time, it reindexes. (skipped if indexes are in DB and sensitivity is low)
trans-unit.target: If there was no indexing in this time, it reindexes. (skipped if indexes are in DB and sensitivity is low)

trans-unit.source: Reads this many photos from sub folders
trans-unit.target: Reads this many photos from sub folders

trans-unit.source: Set the reindexing sensitivity. High value check the folders for change more often
trans-unit.target: Set the reindexing sensitivity. High value check the folders for change more often

trans-unit.source: If you add a new folder to your gallery, the site indexes it automatically.
trans-unit.target: If you add a new folder to your gallery, the site indexes it automatically.

trans-unit.source: If you would like to trigger indexing manually, click index button.
trans-unit.target: If you would like to trigger indexing manually, click index button.

trans-unit.source: Note: search only works among the indexed directories
trans-unit.target: Note: search only works among the indexed directories

trans-unit.source: Indexes the folders and also creates the thumbnails
trans-unit.target: Indexes the folders and also creates the thumbnails

trans-unit.source: Url has been copied to clipboard
trans-unit.target: Url has been copied to clipboard

trans-unit.source: Restart the server to apply the new settings
trans-unit.target: Restart the server to apply the new settings
